Combine all sub-designs into the overall trial design object

create_trial_design.Rd

Combine all sub-designs into the overall trial design object

Usage

create_trial_design(
  file = NULL,
  sampling_design = NULL,
  target_design = NULL,
  initial_regimen_design = NULL,
  regimen_update_design = NULL,
  sim_design = NULL,
  est_design = NULL,
  eval_design = NULL
)

Arguments

file

a YAML file with all subdesigns

sampling_design

Design for sampling, from create_sampling_design()

target_design

Design for target attainment, from create_target_design()

initial_regimen_design

Design for initial regimen, from create_initial_regimen_design()

regimen_update_design

Design for dose/regimen optimization, from create_regimen_update_design()

sim_design

Design for simulation model, from create_model_design()

est_design

Design for estimation, from create_model_design()

eval_design

Design for evaluation metrics, from create_eval_design()
